casebody.data:
BOWDEN, Respondent, v. GALEN et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fifth Department. March 27, 1894.) Action by Robert Y. Bowden against Lewis Galen, as president, etc., and ■others.

Argued before DWIGHT, P. J., and LEWIS, HAIGHT, and BRADLEY, JJ.

No opinion. Interlocutory judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs, with leave to amend answer within 20 days, upon the payment of the costs of this appeal and of the demurrer.
